products.name: MacBook Air
products.description: The MacBook Air is thin, light, and powerful, with all-day battery life, and features the Apple-designed M1 chip for amazing performance.

products.name: iPad Pro
products.description: The iPad Pro is the ultimate tablet for power users, with a Liquid Retina display, powerful Apple Silicon chip, and support for the Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard.

products.name: AirPods Pro
products.description: AirPods Pro deliver immersive sound with Active Noise Cancellation, an adaptive EQ, and transparency mode for when you need to be aware of your surroundings.
